metadata.description: Its zombies vs. vampires, with desperate citizens caught in the crossfire, as the legendary George Romero unleashes the final chapter in his new undead epic! Zombie Autopsy! But is Xavier dead or undead? Dr. Penny Jones may have a nasty surprise coming her way! Who is kidnapping the children of NYC, where are they taking them, and why? The future of Manhattan may rest in the answers!
metadata.name: George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act Three
